msContents.summary: Register of payment of the syntaximon; payments are of 4 or multiples of 4 drachmas; the total of each day's receipt was given in the margin at the left; the names were unchecked, but in col. V. 14, 17-22, 25-28 the amounts were checked by a short vertical stroke above the sum; entries consist of name, patronymic and an amount

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers; recto published as P.Princ. 9
The hand is a small, rapid cursive

Eight columns : col. I, 32 lines; col. II, 32 lines; col. III, 31 lines; col. IV, 31 lines; col. V, 32 lines; col. VI, 29 lines; col. VII, 32 lines; col. VIII, 31 lines; complete, but part of a larger roll

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: [col. I] The 20th year of Tiberius Caesar Augustus, month of Tybi. Record of syntaximon paid in the village of Philadelphia of the same year. 6th Polemon s. of Polemon s. of Aste-, 8; Polemon s. of Polemon, 8; Maron s. of Ammonios, 12; Mysthas s. of Petechon, 12; Pnepheros s. of Pnepheros s. of Lakon, 4; Petosiris s. of Harphaesis the older, 8; Melankomas s. of Herakles, 12; [l. 10] Hatres s. of Hatres donkey-driver, 8; 72; 8th Mysthas s. of Hatres, 4; Apelles s. of Herakles, 12; 16; 11th Horos s. of Horos s. of Arbesis, 12; Peteuris s. of Hektor, 12; Nekpheros s. of Harmysis, 8; 32; 16th Papontos s. of Papontos s. of Lauous, 4; [l. 20] Petearmotes s. of Merres, 4; Sambas s. of Arabion, 4; Ptollis s. of Praxias s. of Sp. . ., 4; Pnepheros s. of Nekpheros s. of Pol-, 4; Papontos stepson of Chairemon, 8; Horos s. of Horos opo-, 16; Keras s. of Horos opo-, 16; Meoples s. of Mysthas, 4; Ptollis s. of Papontos s. of Thate-, 8; Petermouthis s. of Panomgeus, 8; [l. 30] Anoubion s. of Meleagros, 4; Meleagros s. of Anoubion, 4; Horos s. of Mysthas s. of Harpas, 4. [col. II] Sisois s. of Zoilos, 4; Mysthas s. of Thoes, 8; Kerakles s. of Keras, 4; Pylades s. of Herakles, 4; Herakles s. of Herakles copper-smith, 4; Pnepheros s. of Ptollis, 4; Herakles s. of Ambesis, 8; Mysthas s. of Ammonis, 12; Petermouthis s. of Peteesis the younger, 8; [l. 10] Onnophris s. of Petearpsenesis, 4; Petermouthis s. of Peteme-, for wages 8; Petosiris s. of Petosiris s. of Kenne-, 4; Sambas s. of Hatres s. of Hatr. . , 4; Ammonis s. of Herakles weaver, 8; Panetbys s. of Peteuchos s. of Phermesis, 12; Nekpheros s. of Nekpheros s. of Hales, 4; Heras s . of Heras stepson of Koskonios, 8; Herakleides s. of Horos s. of Harpa-, 4; Iason s. of Hatres cobbler, 12; [20] Ision Euemeres, 4; Onnophris s. of Horos cowherd, 4; Herakles s. of Harmysis weaver, 4; Keras s. of Amonios, 8; Apion s. of Apion vegetable seller, 8; Herakles s. of Apion, 8; Pnepheros s. of Archedemos, 8; Aischrion s. of Herakleides weaver, 8; Tryphon s. of Tryphon oil-manufacturer, 8; Mysthas s. of Nekpheros s. of Tarurinos, 8; [l. 30] Dioskys s. of Ptolemios weaver, 4; Herieus s. of Pabes, 4; Herakleides s. of Horos weaver, 4. [col. [col. VII] . . ., 4; . . .; [The total of the day was entered here in the margin]; . . . s. of likewise s. of Nikanor, 4; [l. 5] . . ., 4; . . . s. of Nekpheros, 8; . . ., 8; . . . s. of Sambas, 8; . . . s. of Ptolion, 4; . . . s. of Ischyrion, 12; [l. 10] . . . s. of Kephalon, 8; . . .phis s. of Nekpheros, 4; . . . s. of Ischyrion, 16; . . .ouros s. of Apynchis, 4; [l. 15] Horos s. of P-, 4; Pankrates s. of Haryotes the older, 4; 88; 20th, . . .on s. of Ammonis, 8; Peteuchos s. of Peteuchos . . ., 8; [l. 20] . . .on s. of Teos, 4; Pam- s. of likewise s. of At-, 4; . . . s. of likewise s. of Au( ), 4; . . . s. of likewise s. of Kra-, 20; Nekpheros s. of Pteuchos s. of Sikanos, 4; [l. 25] . . . s. of Hermias, 4; . . . s. of Hierax, 4; . . . s. of Onophrer, 4; . . . s. of Onnophris, 4; Sisois s. of Zoilos, 4; [l. 30] . . . s. of Herakles weaver, 4; . . . s. of Hatres the younger, 4; . . . s. of likewise swineherd, 4.
